search.query: | tstats count AS count from datamodel=NMON_Data_CPU where (nodename = CPU) (CPU.frameID="*") ($osfilter$) groupby "CPU.frameID", "CPU.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS count by "CPU.frameID" | rename "CPU.frameID" AS "frameID" | fields frameID | sort frameID

| tstats count AS count from datamodel=NMON_Data_CPU where (nodename = CPU) (CPU.frameID=$frameID$) (CPU.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($osfilter$) groupby "CPU.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS count by "CPU.hostname" | rename "CPU.hostname" AS hostname | fields hostname | sort hostname

single.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="CPU_ALL" OR type="LPAR" $hostname$ | stats count by type | sort - type | head 1 | eval datasource=case(match(type, "LPAR"), "LPAR (Virtual Processor usage)", match(type, "CPU_ALL"), "CPU_ALL (Percentage usage)") | stats values(datasource) As datasource

chart.title: CPU Usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="CPU_ALL" OR type="LPAR" $hostname$ | eval lpar_vpconso=round(((VP_User_PCT+VP_Sys_PCT+VP_Wait_PCT+VP_Idle_PCT)*virtualCPUs/100),2) | eval cpu_pctconso=(Sys_PCT+User_PCT+Wait_PCT) | stats values(lpar_vpconso) As lpar_vpconso, values(cpu_pctconso) As cpu_pctconso by _time,hostname | eval conso=if(isnotnull(lpar_vpconso),lpar_vpconso,cpu_pctconso) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=CPU_ALL OR type=LPAR,$hostname$)` max(conso) As "CPU Usage"

chart.title: I/O Per second
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKXFER*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As iosec by _time,hostname | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKXFER,$hostname$)` max(iosec) As "IO Per sec"

chart.title: CPU_ALL, % by category
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="CPU_ALL" $hostname$ | eval cpu_PCT=(Sys_PCT+User_PCT+Wait_PCT) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=CPU_ALL,$hostname$)` avg(Sys_PCT) As Sys_PCT, avg(User_PCT) As User_PCT, avg(Wait_PCT) As Wait_PCT, avg(Idle_PCT) As Idle_PCT

chart.title: CPU_ALL, % global usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="CPU_ALL" $hostname$ | eval cpu_PCT=(Sys_PCT+User_PCT+Wait_PCT) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=CPU_ALL,$hostname$)` max(cpu_PCT) As "%CPU Max Usage", avg(cpu_PCT) As "%CPU Avg Usage"

chart.title: TOP, CPU Usage per logical core
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,pct_CPU,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where pct_CPU<=limit | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,Command | eval conso_per_core=(pct_CPU/100) | stats sum(conso_per_core) As conso_per_core by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(conso_per_core) as "CPU Usage per core" by Command

chart.title: TOP, Memory Usage per command invocation
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,PID,Command,ResText,ResData,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats count(Command) As count, avg(ResText) As ResText, sum(ResData) As ResData by _time,hostname,Command | eval Used_Mem_MB=((ResData+ResText)/1024) | stats sum(Used_Mem_MB) As Used_Mem_MB by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(Used_Mem_MB) as "Used_Memory" by Command

chart.title: TOP, MinorFault per Command invocation
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,MinorFault,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats sum(MinorFault) As MinorFault by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(MinorFault) as "MinorFault" by Command

chart.title: TOP, MajorFault per Command invocation
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,MajorFault,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats sum(MajorFault) As MajorFault by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(MajorFault) as "MajorFault" by Command

chart.title: TOP, Shared library pages per Command invocation
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,ShdLib,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats sum(ShdLib) As ShdLib By _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(ShdLib) as ShdLib by Command

chart.title: PROC, Kernel Threads in run queue and to be paged (RunQueue, Swap-In)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PROC" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=PROC,$hostname$)` max(Runnable) As "RunQueue", max(Swap_in) As "Swap_in"

chart.title: PROC, Context switches and system calls (pswitch, syscall)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PROC" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=PROC,$hostname$)` max(pswitch) As "pswitch/sec", max(syscall) As "syscall/sec"

chart.title: PROC, Fork and Exec system calls (fork, exec)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PROC" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=PROC,$hostname$)` max(fork) As "pswitch/sec", max(exec) As "exec/sec"

chart.title: VM, Pageins and pageouts (since last boot)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(pgpgin) As pgpgin, max(pgpgout) As pgpgout

chart.title: VM, swapins and swapouts (since last boot)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(pswpin) As pswpin, max(pswpout) As pswpout

chart.title: MEM, Memory usage (% usage)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEM" $hostname$ | eval buffers_PCT=round(((buffers/memtotal)*100),2) | eval cached_PCT=round(((cached/memtotal)*100),2) | eval active_PCT=round(((active/memtotal)*100),2) | eval inactive_PCT=round(((inactive/memtotal)*100),2) | eval memfree_PCT=round(((memfree/memtotal)*100),2) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,$hostname$)` max(buffers_PCT) As "buffers %", max(cached_PCT) As "cached %", max(active_PCT) As "active %", max(inactive_PCT) As "inactive %", max(memfree_PCT) As "memfree %"

chart.title: MEM, Memory usage (Volume usage in MB)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,$hostname$)` max(buffers) As "buffers (MB)", max(cached) As "cached (MB)", max(active) As "active (MB)", max(inactive) As "inactive (MB)", max(memfree) As "memfree (MB)", max(memtotal) As "memtotal (MB)"

chart.title: MEM, Swap usage (% usage)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEM" $hostname$ | eval swapused=round((swaptotal-swapfree),0) | eval swapused_PCT=round(((swapused/swaptotal)*100),2) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,$hostname$)` max(swapused_PCT) As "swapused %"

chart.title: MEM, Swap usage (Volume usage in MB)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEM" $hostname$ | eval swapused=round((swaptotal-swapfree),0) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,$hostname$)` max(swaptotal) As "swaptotal (MB)", max(swapused) As "swapused (MB)"

chart.title: DISKBSIZE, Average data transfer size
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKBSIZE*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As avg_transfer_size by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKBSIZE,$hostname$)` max(avg_transfer_size) As avg_transfer_size

chart.title: DISKBUSY, Disk Busy Activity
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKBUSY*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As busy_time by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKBUSY,$hostname$)` max(busy_time) As busy_time

chart.title: DISKREAD, Disk Read Data Rate
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKREAD*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As read_data_rate by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKREAD,$hostname$)` max(read_data_rate) As read_data_rate

chart.title: DISKWRITE, Disk Write Data Rate
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKWRITE*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As write_data_rate by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKWRITE,$hostname$)` max(write_data_rate) As write_data_rate

chart.title: DISKXFER, Disk I/O Operations per second (IOPS)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKXFER*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As IOPS by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKXFER,$hostname$)` max(IOPS) As IOPS

chart.title: JFSFILE, Percentage Usage of File-systems
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="JFSFILE" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 useother=f `inline_customspan(type=JFSFILE,$hostname$)` avg(value) As pct_fs_used by device

chart.title: NET - Network Interfaces Activity by Host
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="NET" $hostname$ | eval rate=round((value/1000),2) | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan(type=NET,$hostname$)` max(rate) As rate by device

chart.title: NETPACKET - Number of read/write packets
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="NETPACKET" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan(type=NETPACKET,$hostname$)` max(value) As value by device

chart.title: NFS Server V4
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=NFSSVRV4 $hostname$ | fields _time,hostname,op0-unused,op1-unused,op2-future,access,close,commit,create,delegpurge,delegreturn,getattr,getfh,link,lock,lockt,locku,lookup,lookup_root,nverify,open,openattr,open_conf,open_dgrd,putfh,putpubfh,putrootfh,read,readdir,readlink,remove,rename,renew,restorefh,savefh,secinfo,setattr,setcltid,setcltidconf,verify,write,rellockowner | stats sum(*) As * by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=NFSSVRV4,$hostname$)` max(*) as *

chart.title: NFS Server V3
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=NFSSVRV3 $hostname$ | fields _time,hostname,null,getattr,setattr,lookup,access,readlink,read,write,create,mkdir,symlink,mknod,remove,rmdir,rename,link,readdir,readdirplus,fsstat,fsinfo,pathconf,commit | stats sum(*) As * by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=NFSSVRV3,$hostname$)` max(*) as *

chart.title: NFS Server V2
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=NFSSVRV2 $hostname$ | fields _time,hostname,null,getattr,setattr,root,lookup,readlink,read,wrcache,write,create,remove,rename,link,symlink,mkdir,rmdir,readdir,fsstat | stats sum(*) As * by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=NFSSVRV2,$hostname$)` max(*) as *

chart.title: NFS Client V4
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=NFSCLIV4 $hostname$ | fields _time,hostname,null,read,write,commit,open,open_conf,open_noat,open_dgrd,close,setattr,fsinfo,renew,setclntid,confirm,lock,lockt,locku,access,getattr,lookup,lookup_root,remove,rename,link,symlink,create,pathconf,statfs,readlink,readdir,server_caps,delegreturn,getacl,setacl,fs_locations | stats sum(*) As * by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=NFSCLIV4,$hostname$)` max(*) as *

chart.title: NFS Client V3
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=NFSCLIV3 $hostname$ | fields _time,hostname,null,getattr,setattr,lookup,access,readlink,read,write,create,mkdir,symlink,mknod,remove,rmdir,rename,link,readdir,readdirplus,fsstat,fsinfo,pathconf,commit | stats sum(*) As * by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=NFSCLIV3,$hostname$)` max(*) as *

chart.title: NFS Client V2
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=NFSCLIV2 $hostname$ | fields _time,hostname,null,getattr,setattr,root,lookup,readlink,read,wrcache,write,create,remove,rename,link,symlink,mkdir,rmdir,readdir,fsstat | stats sum(*) As * by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=NFSCLIV2,$hostname$)` max(*) as *
